findings.rationale: A five-year duration may be insufficient for certain types of sensitive information, potentially leading to risks after the agreement expires.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement shall remain in effect for a period of five (5) years from the date of execution.

findings.rationale: Allowing the Disclosing Party to seek injunctive relief without posting a bond increases the risk of potential abuse or misuse of this provision.
findings.evidence_quote: the Disclosing Party shall be entitled to seek injunctive relief without posting bond or other security.

findings.rationale: Restricting assignment without consent may complicate business transactions or restructuring efforts, potentially stalling important changes.
findings.evidence_quote: Neither party may assign this Agreement without the prior written consent of the other party.
